name: Spacecraft War
description:
《Spacecraft War》is a first-person shooting game. An alien ship carrying an alien mutant dog fell in no man's land. As the only remaining soldier of the special forces, it can win by destroying all the alien mutant dogs. The game scene is exquisite science fiction, the game model action is real exciting, the player needs to maintain the life value and use two kinds of guns to wipe out all the dogs can win.
WASD controls character movement
F pick up the gun
